@graph.name: GigaScience-RNAseq-Optitype-seq2HLA-to-IEDB-alleles
@graph.description:
Prediction of HLA binding for verified candidates

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Neoantigen 6: Predicting HLA Binding](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/proteomics/tutorials/neoantigen-6-predicting-hla-binding/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features
